Inhalt: I was looking for a new apartment, but the rental prices were so high.
I looked at many apartments, but none were perfect.
Then I saw an advertisement for an apartment in an old castle.
I drove there, but when I arrived, the castle was in a bad condition.
The landlord was an older man with a parrot on his shoulder.
He showed me the apartment, but there were cobwebs everywhere and it smelled strange.
The parrot kept shouting 'No, no!' the whole time.
I politely declined and quickly ran away.
